Description: Blue-green glazed composition shabti of Wahibreemakhet with plain lappet wig, plain long beard, arms crossed holding two hoes in shallow relief, seed-bag over left shoulder, uninscribed back-pillar, and on lower half of front eight horizontal lines of hieroglyphs giving chapter 6 from the Book of the Dead.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Lt-Gen Augustus W H Meyrick
